welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Borgholzhausen, known for its stunning landscapes and historic architecture. We invite you to immerse yourself in the city's beauty and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bielefeld Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or fee for access.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Münster Osnabrück International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.
